const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const typeorm_1 = require("@nestjs/typeorm");
const article_like_entity_1 = require("./entities/article-like.entity");
const typeorm_2 = require("typeorm");
const articles_service_1 = require("../articles/articles.service");
let ArticleLikesService = class ArticleLikesService {
    constructor(articleLikesRepository, articleService) {
        this.articleLikesRepository = articleLikesRepository;
        this.articleService = articleService;
    }
    create(createArticleLikeDto) {
        return this.articleLikesRepository.save(this.articleLikesRepository.create(createArticleLikeDto));
    }
    async toggleLike(createArticleLikeDto) {
        const articleLike = await this.articleLikesRepository.findOne({
            where: {
                userId: createArticleLikeDto.userId,
                articleId: createArticleLikeDto.articleId,
            },
        });
        if (articleLike) {
            await this.articleLikesRepository.delete(articleLike.id);
            await this.articleService.updateLikeCount(articleLike.articleId, 'sub');
        }
        else {
            await this.articleLikesRepository.save(this.articleLikesRepository.create(createArticleLikeDto));
            await this.articleService.updateLikeCount(createArticleLikeDto.articleId, 'add');
        }
        return articleLike;
    }
    async getLikedByUser(userId, articleId) {
        return await this.articleLikesRepository.findOne({
            where: {
                userId: userId,
                articleId: articleId,
            },
        });
    }
    findAll() {
        return `This action returns all articleLikes`;
    }
    findOne(id) {
        return `This action returns a #${id} articleLike`;
    }
    update(id, updateArticleLikeDto) {
        return `This action updates a #${id} articleLike`;
    }
    remove(id) {
        return `This action removes a #${id} articleLike`;
    }
};

    (0, common_1.Injectable)(),
    __param(0, (0, typeorm_1.InjectRepository)(article_like_entity_1.ArticleLike)),

        articles_service_1.ArticlesService])

exports.ArticleLikesService = ArticleLikesService;
